attributes.action: create more patrol officers to patrol streets and towns identifying people who litter the streets or town centres. We have rules in place to fine people who litter but never see officers around to catch people who litter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to many people litter on the floor and get away with it.we know that if you drop litter you are going to be fined a sum of money, thing is people still get away with it. there is not enough people to enforce the fines and that is what we want changeing.the more officers that can be out on the streets the more chance people will stop littering.
